sub_topic: Prove that the symmetric difference of two sets is distributive over intersection.
message_1: Let A = {2, 3, 5, 6, 7} and B = {1, 3, 5, 7, 9}. Find the symmetric difference of the sets A and (B ∩ {1, 2, 3, 4, 5}) and prove that it is equal to the union of the symmetric difference between A and B and the symmetric difference between A and {1, 2, 3, 4, 5}.
